headline: How Record Digital Gains And Bigger Buybacks At News (NWSA) Have Changed Its Investment Story
summary: News Corp recently reported past quarters of record revenue and profitability, driven by Dow Jones, Digital Real Estate Services and growing digital and AI-related income, while also announcing an expanded share repurchase program totaling US$1.30 billions. The combination of higher-margin digital revenues, reinforced protection of intellectual property in AI partnerships, and accelerated buybacks points to management’s focus on capital efficiency and business mix evolution. With this...
